subject: Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: In 1988 Valeri Liukin moved his hand in the wrong direction for one split second and lost the all-around gold by one-tenth of a point. Now the Liukins have an all-around gold medal.
snippet: In 1988 Valeri Liukin moved his hand in the wrong direction for one split second and lost the all-around gold by one-tenth of a point. Now the Liukins have an all-around gold medal.
